Очередная игра, убитая разработчиками, которым абсолютно плевать на мнение игроков. Крайнее обновление это доказало. Сделать анимации настолько кривыми - это нужно было постараться. У них была уйма времени с ПТБ и отзывы к нему, чтобы что-то исправить, но вместо этого они выкатили этот навозный шар. Искренне надеюсь на то, что он разрастется до таких размеров, что Вы не сможете его проигнорировать, а если все же сделаете это, то покажите просто свое неуважение к игрокам. 

И, по классике, - плач сурвмейнера: хиты в окно пролетают, как горячие пирожки; Витя летает к звездам, и задевает тебя за камнем; Орех в игре отсутствует, как перк; гарпун притягивает тебя из Нарнии, попадая в Хогвартс. И, не смотря на все это, "МЫ ПОТРАТИМ ВРЕМЯ НА РАЗРАБОТКУ НОВЫХ АНИМАЦИЙ, а на устранение старых ошибок игры у нас времени нет, мы просто будем о них знать!"

Thx, Behaviour Interactive Inc!

Dead by Daylight is a fun and annoying game...
Dead by Daylight puts pressure on no communication and teamwork. 

Killers and survivors are both very strong. It all depends on the skills, of the enemy. 
If a bad killer meets a good survivor, it's easy for the survivor and the other way around. 

Survivors:
Survivors need to escape the game, by finishing 5 gens or escaping via the hatch.
Survivors have various perks to help them from being spotted by the killer, to getting away from the killer.
Surviors have pallets and windows, as an extra help to keep the killer away from them.
Nowadays survivors escape depends, on how good their movement and juking is.

Killers:
Killers objective is to kill the survivors. Killers ultimate goal is to kill all four survivors, but killing three or mionimum two is enough.
There a different killers with different powers. Some killers are free and some cost real life money.
Killers have various perks and offerings, to make it easier to find surviors, and to kill them.
The queue nowadays, can be long. As a killer, you can have good games and bad games. It depends on, how good you are and how good the survivors are.

Dead by Daylight can be fun but also annoying so taking breaks sometimes, can really help. 
The game is fun playing solo and with friends.

I rate the game 7/10 - 8/10.

This game is absolutely terrible. Speaking from 200 hours of game play. The killers are way overpowered. Was fun at one point but once everyone started using Hex Ruin and BBQ and chili it's no longer fun. Note to the developers... tip the scales a little more in favor of the survivors. I wouldn't mind winning 1 in 10 but playing for 5 hours and getting destroyed over and over is exhausting. If you enjoy winning one out of ever 40 games this is the game for you!

I really like this game. It's not completely balanced, but that adds to the fun in a lot of ways. As the survivor it is a high stakes game of hide and seek, with a focus on patience and stealth. As the killer, it is a fun game of finding and killing everyone that thought they could come in your backyard. Overall it has tons of hours of gameplay, and a nice leveling system. My only real complaint is that the late night community seems to be mostly ass holes and douche bags. I recommend, it is well worth the price.

This game is literally broken and not in a good way. The amount of bugs and game breaking glitches is just insane. There's a pretty big chance you will also encounter a bug that will restrict you from progressing the ranks as well leaving you in a low elo-hell. Contacting support does nothing. I don't blame support for not fixing the issue, because it lies way deeper inside the code that some idiot messed up years ago. Speaking of years ago, some bugs from the launch are still present in the game despite it being 3yo at this point. BHVR cares about skins and DLC that cost several times more than the game if combined and not about keeping their playerbase happy. Also playing this game makes me feel like an asshole, no matter if it is survivor or killer. Oh, and guess how toxic community is... It was never fun playing this game, but addicting as hell. If you want an abusive relationship like this, take a shot.

Played the game for a long time and honestly it's great (except for the raging rank 20's who can't stand to play against semi-good killers). In the first 100 hours the game seems to be extremely difficult and annoying, but as you get better and start understanding the mentality of killers/survivors you can pull off some great mind-games playing both killer and survivor (even though I'm kinda bad at playing survivor). 
Several killers are underpowered, but I've heard that they will get "fixed" in a couple of months.
If you decide to play solo surv, you should ALWAYS determine your team's mentality (if they're altruistic, you can make risky plays and not worry about dying on first/second hook) (if they're always hiding from the killer, your job is to be stealthier than them and just let them die one by one on the hooks, so you can eventually get the hatch/escape).

As for playing killer, everything depends on the perks you take, some are entirely useless, others are godlike (not even speaking of addons). 

Just don't be scared of the raging kids that threaten to report you because you kept denying them totems/gens or if you tunnel a bit. DO NOT ALWAYS tunnel/camp, it will get you less Bloodpoints and you'll be prone to "genrushing". In some cases you just have to tunnel or camp a bit and it's understandable if it's near the end of the game. But if you want to camp, at least do it well... So many killers let their guard down and lose the camped survivor because of some brain plays from the survivors. And if you see a facecamping Chainsaw killer, don't even think about rescuing the hooked survivor, you'll die with him.

That being said, this is a very adventurous game that just keeps on getting better :)
